name: Princess Girls: Fairy Kingdom
description:
Beautiful princesses will again make you a company in your unforgettable adventures! Together with Elsa and Anna, you will conquer all the expanses of the fairy world, as well as find other princesses, such as Jasmine, Rapunzel, Ariel, etc. In the creative mode, you will get everything you need to build any creative buildings. Plunge into the fairy-tale world of fantasy and magic, create your cute house or the whole Royal Castle with a beautiful flower garden, and the interior set will create a cosiness and atmosphere (flowers, paintings, kitchen, bedroom, computer table and many others).

- Completely free game for children and adults.
- A lot of beautiful blocks and pieces of furniture.
- Build your own kingdom or fortress by decorating the facade of the building with colorful lanterns.
- Explore the world, extract treasures and make new friends.
- The mobile edition includes new maps and beauties inhabiting this world!

Coming soon will be multiplayer: you can show your friends a luxurious castle, and show them your own; Knight tournament: you will see spectacular competitions of the strongest knights; royal carriage: the best way to quickly move from one kingdom to another!
